Cancer, AIDS, Malaria, Obesity

24 February 2011

New York Times articles featuring the words cancer, AIDS, malaria or obesity from 1981-2010.

Paul May is a researcher and designer from Dublin, living and working in New York. Find out more about Paul's work or get in touch.
